data.message: Eminem menime shady the white boy from d12 b rabbit and Marshall Bruce mathers lll if y'all know his struggle and what he went through good for you but if you don't stop dissing on him not even busta could come close to Eminem he started shady records in 1999 and he's part of the hip hop duo bad meets evil in order to be signed into shady records you have to beat him In a rap battle idk how yelawolf did it but congrats to him love the song best friend
